alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Jones; Mainland Hyde; Northern Craven; Pamlico; Southern Craven (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 31 at 10:46PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Jones, central Craven, northwestern Hyde, southeastern Beaufort and northern Pamlico Counties through 1130 PM EDT... At 1045 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Trent Woods, or near New Bern, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... New Bern, James City, Trent Woods, River Bend, Belhaven, Sladesville, Ransomville, Ponzer, Swindell Fork, Scranton, Pamlico Beach, Askins, Cayton, Lowland, Edward, Royal, Bonnerton, Rose Bay, Bayview and Olympia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Beaufort; Jones; Mainland Hyde; Northern Craven; Pamlico; Southern Craven
